body.name: USX MOUNT UL Listed TV Wall Mount for 42"-85" TVS up to 110lbs and 8"-24" Wood Studs, TV Mount with Tilt, Swivel & Extension, TV Mounts Bracket with Dual Articulating Arms, Max VESA 600x400mm
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 51 mins
features: Adjustable Wall Plate: The wall mount TV bracket with adjustable wall plate is designed to fit for 24" wood studs apart or 16" and off center. Just easily rotate the adjustable wall plate to get longer wall plate.

Flexible Movement: The tv mount 24 inch studs includes +5/-15º tilting, +/- 45º swivel and +/-4º post-installation leveling. You can extend the 75 inch tv wall mount up to 16.67 inch, or retract it back to low profile 2.58 inch.

Heavy Duty Sturdy: The TV mount 55 inch+ is made of high-quality steel with 6 articulating arms to move smoothly. This full motion TV wall mount fits most 42-85 inch TVs with VESA size 200*100mm to 600*400mm and max weight 110lbs.

Easy Instalation: The tilting TV wall mount includes detailed instruction and paper template, all included hardware in pre-labeled bags to make the tv barckets mounting easier and quicker. If you need concrete anchors, please contact us to get it.

US-Based Customer Service: The 65 inch tv wall mount comes with bubble level, mounting template, 3 pieces pack of cable ties, all standard mounting hardware, and 10-year friendly after-sales service. Not sure if the mount will work? Please tell us your complete TV models.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Almost 30 years experience in TV Mount producing and design, products are sold to millions of families around the world. Providing our customers reliable, safety, easy installation tv mounts ensuring a perfect viewing experience. USX MOUNT brings you the best TV mount choice!

By securely attaching your TV to the wall, you free up precious floor space that can be better utilized for other purposes. To further enhance safety, it's essential to choose a high-quality TV mount suitable for your TV's size and weight.

Not wide enough to reach your wood stud? The collapsible wall plate design tv mount is your best choice, 16" extend to 24", perfect 24 inch stud tv wall mount, provide you more choice and easy to get the tv centering.

+/-4°after installation allows the TV perfect leveling, detail installation manual and standard mounting hardware packs help you easily finish the installation. Please strictly follow the instructions for installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and secure
reviews.reviewText: Very heavy duty and high quality. The only I had to get myself were bolts to attach it to my monitor as the various ones it came with all didn't fit well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome ! Best mount !
reviews.reviewText: I use usx mounts throughout my house . This is very useful when your studs not standard 16 inches apart . Retractable and tilting . Good quality and strong . NOTE you will need to buy longer size m6 screws for lg oled TVs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid...Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Solid, heavy mount with excellent full range of motion. Does everything we want it to do. Unbelievable value for something this well made and packaged. Even comes with a little mini level (didn't use it but a nice touch, nonetheless).The instructions are very very good and very clear and concise.Hardware is labeled which is good because there are several screw types for different parts of the mount.Don't forget to lock the extension bars with the short screws if you are going for the 24" width.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to move around and easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, but the movement is very stiff.
reviews.reviewText: It works well, but the movement is very stiff. I can't just grab the TV and move it into place. I can slowly move the TV away from the wall, but then I have to physically reach behind the TV to the mount itself to position the TV where I want it. Hopefully over time it will loosen up a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am using this mount with a 72-pound, 75-inch TV. It feels surprisingly solid, and holds the TV quite rigidly, with just a little but of "sagging" when the TV is pulled more than a few inches away from the wall. Please note that if your wall studs are 24 inches apart (like mine), this mount technically can span that distance, but then you will have little or no horizontal adjustability. Therefore, you might not be able to center your TV where you want it unless you extend the TV away from the wall by at least a couple of inches. You might have to do what I did to be able to center the mount where you want it: I removed a roughly 2-foot by 3-foot section of drywall (the longer sides were horizontal), attached the mount to a similarly sized 0.5-inch thick plywood panel (using through-bolts, nuts, and washers), and attached the plywood panel to the exposed wall studs (using strong screws). If you measure everything carefully, you can get the mount centered where you want it. I didn't really need to remove any drywall, but I wanted my TV to be as close to the wall as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product at a great value
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product. All the parts are high-quality, durable, and leave you with a ton of confidence that your TV will be safe and secure.It took my brother and I about 30 minutes to setup.Couple that with the cost of the product, and it really is a home-run. Don't hesitate do buy this!
